en.name: Skyward Blade
en.passiveDescription: CRIT Rate increased by {{4//5//6//7//8%}}. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by {{10//10//10//10//10%}}, increases ATK SPD by {{10//10//10//10//10%}}, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to {{20//25//30//35//40%}} of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.
